message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think you'd be interested in. It's worth at least $100 to me, so I'm offering it to you for $110. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest but $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95, given that I'm confident this product will be of great value to you. Let me know if you're interested in that price.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think $95 is a bit steep. I'd be willing to meet you at $92. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
